[[inst_hl_sbp]]
==== HL.SBP

*Syntax:* hl.sbp SrcD, SrcD1, [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}>]

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_sbp.svg[HL.SBP encoding,width=800]

*Group:* STA/PAIR
